mapper.insert: insert into t_user (name, username, password, mobile, email, province, city, district, address, status, last_login_time, sex, label, image_name, image), values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{address}, #{status}, #{last_login_time}, #{sex}, #{label}, #{image_name}, #{image})
insert into t_content (user_id, content, p_date, status) values (#{user_id}, #{content}, #{p_date}, #{status})
